N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.3 - Public notice

State Regulations
(a) Upon submission of an application for a certificate of public advantage or an application to renew a certificate of public advantage, each party to be covered by the certificate shall conspicuously post on its public website, in a form determined by the department, a description of the application with an electronic link to the section of the department's public website where applications for certificates of public advantage are summarized. If the party has no public website, it shall provide notice to the public in a manner acceptable to the department. (b) The department shall publish on the department's public website a notice of the receipt of each application for a certificate of public advantage, with a brief summary of the application and instructions for persons wishing to provide comments.
